Flow.description: Flow to allow planners to set up recommendations to transfer funds between products
Flow.label: Recommendation | set up internal transfers

fields.name: DoneText
fields.fieldText:
This recommendation will be created once you've finished this flow.

If you click Next, you'll be taken to the screen that allow you to select the next recommendation type you'd like to create.

fields.name: productDisplayRec
fields.fieldText:
Please provide the transfer details for this product:


Name: {!destinationRecommendationSelect.firstSelectedRow.DestinationName__c}.

value.stringValue: Has the source product been taken up already?

fields.name: fullAmountRec
fields.fieldText:
Amount

The expected value will be the full value of the source account as shown above.

fields.name: tooHighISARec
fields.fieldText: Please be aware the amount you have selected is over £20,000, the standard tax free allowance for ISAs.﻿

validationRule.errorMessage: This phasing plan involves investing less than the Hubwise minimum per month (£1,000). Please decrease the phasing period appropriately.

value.stringValue: Will the fulfilment have a non standard deadline?
Is there an action that has to happen before this transfer can go ahead?

fields.name: productDisplay
fields.fieldText:
Please provide the transfer details for this product:


Name: {!destinationProductSelect.firstSelectedRow.Name}

﻿Value: {!destinationProductSelect.firstSelectedRow.FP_Value__c}

Account number: {!destinationProductSelect.firstSelectedRow.FinServ__FinancialAccountNumber__c}

value.stringValue: Has the source product been taken up already?

fields.name: fullAmount
fields.fieldText:
Amount

The expected value will be the full value of the source account as shown above.

fields.name: tooHighISA
fields.fieldText: Please be aware the amount you have selected is over £20,000, the standard tax free allowance for ISAs.﻿

validationRule.errorMessage: This phasing plan involves investing less than the Hubwise minimum per month (£1,000). Please decrease the phasing period appropriately.

value.stringValue: Will the fulfilment have a non standard deadline?
Is there an action that has to happen before this transfer can go ahead?

fields.name: destinationExplanation
fields.fieldText:
Internal transfer

Please select the products which you would like to recommend an internal transfer into.

fields.name: crystallisedNote
fields.fieldText: Note that only uncrystallised SIPPs should be chosen. If the destination is a crystallised SIPP, please use a process street checklist.
